Dear Ms. Li,  
Thank you for these past two months — for walking beside me like family as we scoured the Bay Area for homes. You always remembered to bring me a warm cup of soy milk, and secretly helped me land a price I could actually afford. Now that the keys are in my hand, I realize the most precious gift you gave me was your kindness. May good fortune always follow you, just as you patiently guided this clumsy buyer through every step of the way.

With deepest gratitude,  
[Your Name]

---
